channel.title: I need th damn crash patched!
channel.description: Omfg, this guy keeps logging into my server.. he makes himself owner and spawns items and he can even ban me.. all i can do is mass ban him.. it says his ip is 0.0.0.0 and idk what to do! when i ipban him he just loggs back in.. if i could get his normal ip i would b able to ipban him.. and when he;s done with all this he just crashes my server.. anyone know what to do? if you know how to ipban him please contact me and download my client at diagnostic-pk.ucoz.com.. this isn't an advertisement i just really need help! can someone please get his ip for me???

item.title: I need th damn crash patched!
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

Omfg, this guy keeps logging into my server… he makes himself owner and spawns items and he can even ban me… all i can do is mass ban him… it says his ip is 0.0.0.0 and idk what to do! when i ipban him he just loggs back in… if i could get his normal ip i would b able to ipban him… and when he;s done with all this he just crashes my server… anyone know what to do? if you know how to ipban him please contact me and download my client at diagnostic-pk.ucoz.com… this isn’t an advertisement i just really need help! can someone please get his ip for me???
